item.description:
So this is a little last minute, but I'm going to be here and hopefully some of you can make it out as well.

This Friday is Pirate Night at Rock Spot Climbing. That means 50% off climbing and gear rental if you dress up like a pirate! Now as a sponsor of this meetup gorup, Rock Spot Climbing gives us an amazing deal of $10 if you have gear, and $15 if you need gear and or a lesson, so this is a super amazing night! If you have your own gear it's just $5 as long as you come dressed like a pirate. Arrrrr!

I'll be there at 7 until about 10-ish, mostly top roping due to a funky back, but the boulder just got reset so I suggest you come down and check that out as well. The gym is open until midnight so don't feel you have to leave at 10 when I do.

If you've never been to Rock Spot Climbing you will need to take a belay lesson or test if you plan on top rope climbing.

Oh, there will also be free snacks as part of pirate night. No promises on what kind of snacks, but definitely chocolate coins and something else theme-based.

See you all there Friday Night!

~Kat
item.name: Pirate Night at Rock Spot Climbing- Yaaarrrrrr
